14.“Jiang Qing Liu Zhijian zai shoudu dazhuan yuanxiao hongweibing
Zongbu chengli dahui shang de jianghua” (Speeches by Jiang Qing and Liu Zhijian
at the Inaugural Mass Meeting of the Capital University Red Guard General Head-
quarters), 5 September 1966 (Cultural Revolution Database 2002). Liu Zhijian
wasalsothepresident ofthePLAAcademyof Artsand at the timewas vice-
chairman of the CCRG (Organization Department, CCP Central Committee 2004,
477;PartyHistoryResearch OfficeDepartment No.1 2004,581).
